level.text: All applications for grants hereunder shall include the following information:
The applicant’s legal name, address and telephone number;
The names, addresses and telephone numbers of all officers, directors, members, trustees, partners, shareholders, and employees;
As applicable, a copy of the applicant’s charter, articles of incorporation, partnership agreement or registration;
As applicable, the date of incorporation within the District of Columbia;
A copy of the applicant’s Internal Revenue Code § 501(c)(3) letter of exemption, as well as the applicant’s local and federal tax exempt or identification number;
As applicable, the applicant’s audited financial statements for the three years preceding application;

A project narrative, including purposes, objectives, target population, and the number of persons to be served, and the grantee’s plans for adult supervision of youths participating in the proposed activities;
The project, or program manager’s name and a statement as to his/her qualifications;
An itemized list of projected expenditures and revenues, if any;
A budget narrative, including an itemization of expenditures to be funded by the grant hereunder; and
A notarized certification that the grant will be used exclusively to provide, promote, foster, support, or encourage sports and recreation activities among District of Columbia youth.
A false statement by the applicant on any part of the application may be grounds for disqualification or termination of the grant, and may be punishable in accordance with D.C. Code § 22-2514.
All information provided may be investigated as permitted by law or regulation.
Grant applications shall be submitted to the DC Sports Commission, Community Outreach Committee, 2400 East Capitol Street, Robert F. Kennedy Memorial Stadium, Fourth Floor, Washington, DC 20004.
